roleset.name: to economize severly, cut

example.name: both arguments
example.text: Without P&G 's backing , Noxell might not have been able [*-1] to spend the estimated $ 5 million to $ 7 million [*U*] needed [*] [*]-2 to accomplish that without [*-2] scrimping on its existing brands .

roleset.note: Claims to be a member of Vncls bill-54.5. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'scrimp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
